descriptions: The student is unable to identify any personal stressors.
The student identifies one or two stressors with limited accuracy.
The student identifies some personal stressors, but the description lacks detail and clarity.
The student accurately identifies several personal stressors with a reasonable level of detail.
The student comprehensively identifies most personal stressors with clear and insightful descriptions.
The student expertly identifies and articulates a wide range of personal stressors with nuanced understanding.
The student demonstrates no understanding of stress management techniques.
The student mentions one or two stress management techniques without explaining how they work.
The student lists a few stress management techniques but struggles to assess their effectiveness.
The student describes several stress management techniques and offers a basic assessment of their potential benefits.
The student thoroughly assesses a variety of stress management techniques, explaining their mechanisms and potential benefits with clarity.
The student critically evaluates a wide range of stress management techniques, providing insightful analysis of their effectiveness and applicability to different situations.
The student does not attempt to connect stress management techniques to personal stressors.
The student makes a weak connection between one stress management technique and a personal stressor.
The student attempts to connect a few stress management techniques to personal stressors, but the application is superficial.
The student reasonably connects several stress management techniques to specific personal stressors, providing some justification for their choices.
The student thoughtfully connects a variety of stress management techniques to relevant personal stressors, explaining why they might be effective.

The student expertly tailors stress management techniques to address specific personal stressors, providing insightful justifications for their choices based on a deep understanding of both the stressors and the techniques.
